General.Name: Taiwan Cogeneration Corp
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Taiwan Cogeneration Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates and manages cogeneration plants in Taiwan. The company also offers engineering, planning, design, procurement, installation, construction, and financing planning of cogeneration plants, as well as engages in the environmental protection and procurement of fuel for cogeneration systems and related businesses. In addition, it provides cogeneration research and development, technical, and consultation services; manufactures, assembles, leases, installs, repairs, and sells cogeneration equipment; and installs electric equipment and power engineering projects; invests in geothermal and green power plants; and generates wind and solar power energy. Further, the company invests in cogeneration plants, as well as trades in related products. Taiwan Cogeneration Corporation was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
